name: Christmas Cookie Swap 3
description:
Christmas Cookie Swap is a funny match 3 Puzzle game, and just in time for the Xmas holidays.

Marvelous game modes include:
● Chocolate -- Match the cute Christmas items on the chocolate to collect the delicious chocolates.
● Green Lawn -- Drop the items into the green lawn to clean the dirty items.
● Flower basket -- Match items next to the Flower Basket to release the trapped items.
● Flower -- Feed the flower spot with Christmas items to bloom the beautiful flowers for the holidays.

Download the Christmas Cookie Swap now and you will experience the adventure with Christmas Cookie Swap in a snow world of Christmas tree, Santa's hat, Christmas bells and other cute Christmas Items.

LikeUs: https://www.facebook.com/ChristmasCookieSwap
developers: Yummy Nature - Casual Game of Star Crush
